Static Methods

createTextField(?X : Float, ?Y : Float, ?Color : Int, ?Size : Int) : flash.text.TextField

parameters
X Textfield x position.
Y Textfield y position.
Color Textfield color, 0xAARRGGBB.
Size Textfield size.
returns
New label text field at specified position and format.
Helper method for textfield creation.
